CustomField.formula: IF(Information_Verified__c=true,9,IF(NOT(ISBLANK(X401k_TPA__c)),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Current_Prior_Method__c )),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Banker_Name_Ref__c)),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(H_B_Renewal_Date__c)),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Broker_Name_Ref__c)),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(CPA_Name_Ref__c)),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Employees__c)),1,0)+ IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Insurance_Broker_Name_Ref__c)),1,0)+ IF(Contacts_Added__c > 0,1,0))
CustomField.label: MMS Territory Score
